word_mean: 性别，性：根据个体产生配子类型(见于大多数动、植物)决定的基本区别，即个体根据此标准归入适当的类别
卵或大配子由雌性产生，而精子或小配子由雄性产生，在有性生殖中，这两类不同生殖细胞的结合是产生新个体的自然先决条件
linked inheritance 性染色体上的基因所表现的特殊遗传现象。
limited inheritance 性状传递受性别限制的一种遗传现象。
influenced inheritance, inheritance of sex-conditioned characters 基因型的表现受性别影响的现象。

entry.def: The two sexes are the two groups, male and female, into which people and animals are divided according to the function they have in producing young.

example.ex: ...an entertainment star who appeals to all ages and both sexes.
example.tran: 男女老幼都喜欢的娱乐明星

entry.def: The sex of a person or animal is their characteristic of being either male or female.

example.ex: She continually failed to gain promotion because of her sex...
example.tran: 她因为是女性而迟迟得不到晋升。

example.ex: The new technique has been used to identify the sex of foetuses.
example.tran: 这一新技术已经被用来鉴别胎儿的性别。

entry.def: Sex is the physical activity by which people can produce young.

example.ex: He was very open in his attitudes about sex...
example.tran: 他对待性的态度非常开放。

example.ex: The entire film revolves around drugs, sex and violence...
example.tran: 整个影片围绕着毒品、性和暴力展开。

entry.def: If an animal is sexed, someone finds out whether it is male or female.
entry.tran: 辨别…的性别;辨识…的雌雄

example.ex: The birds must be weighed, sexed and tagged.
example.tran: 必须对这些鸟称重，辨识雌雄并挂上标牌。

entry.def: If two people have sex, they perform the act of sex.

example.ex: I had no intention of having sex with him on a first date.
example.tran: 我并没想第一次约会就和他上床。

sentences.sentence: "they had sex in the back seat"

means.word_mean: 2. either of the two categories (male or female) into which most organisms are divided;
3. all of the feelings resulting from the urge to gratify sexual impulses;

sentences.sentence: "the film contained no sex or violence"

means.word_mean: 4. the properties that distinguish organisms on the basis of their reproductive roles;

sentences.sentence: "she didn't want to know the sex of the foetus"
